====== setCaching ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCache::setCaching #}

Enables and disables caching.
===== Syntax =====
void setCaching	( **$enable** )
| **$enable** | boolean | is a flag which specifies whether or not caching should be enabled. |

===== Examples =====
Enable caching:
<code php|Example>
$cache = JFactory::getCache();

$cache->setCaching( true );
</code>

~~DISCUSSION~~
